text: innum (ninaivu kurunkal;) nam kurinom; " inta pattinattul nulaintu anku ninkal virumpiya itattil taralamakap puciyunkal; atan vayilil nulaiyum potu, panivutan talaivananki'hittatun' (-"enkal papac cumaikal ninkattum") enru kurunkal; nam unkalukkaka unkal kurrankalai mannippom; melum nanmai ceyvorukku atikamakak kotuppom
